summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that validates the core functionality of a test runner component, covering parsing of JSON/YAML files, handling of errors and missing properties, enforcement of severity and rule filters, graph‑based checks, path resolution, and report generation.
business_intent: Ensure the test runner reliably processes test definitions, applies enforcement and severity policies, correctly resolves file paths, and produces accurate diagnostic reports, thereby maintaining the integrity of the testing framework.
